items.sentence: Tom's boss is a stuffed shirt, who's very awkward in social situations.
Tom eagerly finished up what was left of the champagne and chicken pie.
Hoping to cheer up his wife, Tom bought her a beautiful pearl necklace.
Tom still hasn't found the courage to talk to the children about death.
Tom was pouring a drink for Mary when he felt the ground start shaking.
The reason Tom didn't arrive on time was because of a traffic accident.
Several people came to Tom's aid when a couple of muggers attacked him.
Tom asked me to tell you that he'd wait for you in front of the school.
The women washed him, tried to dress him, and also gave him a new name.
Mary followed her friend to the hotel because she didn't know the area.
